summary:
Feeling lonely? Need a strong man to carry your things?
Well look no further! The sexy Tiberius is here to spice up your world.
descriptionHtml:
There seems to be a lack of decent looking male followers around..figured I\'d try making one.
This is my first mod, so any advice would be appreciated. :]

You can find him hanging out by the gate in Riverwood.
He is also eligible for marriage.

Recommended mods for best results:
High Quality Eyes by Xenius
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=498

I also use Detailed Faces v2 by Xenius
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=26

Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
(I use the file called Faces - YoungerFacesMergedWithMenByGeonox)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488
author: Bubbasice
